table_information: Use this information to query the nyc_payroll_aggregated table.
table_description: Contains aggregated payroll data for NYC agencies.

table_columns.name: fiscal_year
table_columns.description: Fiscal year of the payroll data.

table_columns.name: total_other_pay
table_columns.description: Total other pay of the employees in the agency.

table_columns.name: total_overtime_pay
table_columns.description: Total overtime pay of the employees in the agency.

table_columns.name: total_regular_gross_pay
table_columns.description: Total regular gross pay of the employees in the agency.
